TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IdentityVerifier extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An base class that can be implemented to verify an expected identity against an authorization context that represents a remote endpoint, or to create an identity from an endpoint address.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The WCF infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A> method first to retrieve the service's identity from the message. Next, the infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A> method with the returned <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
For more information about implementing the class, see [How to: Create a Custom Client Identity Verifier](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-client-identity-verifier.md).

Docs.related: How To: Create a Custom Client Identity Verifier
Specifying the Identity of a Service for Authentication

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Public MustOverride Function CheckAccess (identity As EndpointIdentity, authContext As AuthorizationContext) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Implements a method to verify an identity.
Docs.returns: if the identity is verified; otherwise, . The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool TryGetIdentity (System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress reference, out System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity identity);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryGetIdentity(class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress reference, [out] class System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity& identity) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function TryGetIdentity (reference As EndpointAddress, ByRef identity As EndpointIdentity) As Boolean
public: abstract bool TryGetIdentity(System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ reference, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::ServiceModel::EndpointIdentity ^ % identity);

Docs.param: The to use for creating the identity.
Docs.summary: Tries to create an identity from an endpoint.
Docs.returns: if the identity is returned; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier> creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> based on the hostname portion of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> if an explicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> has not been specified as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
